text: Tokyo Kingdom, in a district under the control of the Fuma Ninja Troops.
In an empty nightclub before business hours, several ninja had gathered in the luxurious VIP room that was hidden in the back.

name: Nisha Gaiza
text: What!? Is that true, Tsubaki?

name: Tsubaki
text: Why would I lie? The man you said you had cut downーDiot-donoーis still alive and well.

name: Gaiza
text: He is...? That can't be...
The man frowning and groaning was Nisha Gaiza, the leader of the Newly Born Fuma Ninja Troops who had broken away from the Taimanin of Gosha.
It was a few days after the Zombie gas attack on the criminal organization "Dragon Gate."
Nomad had given Gaiza control of this district, originally ruled by Dragon Gate, as compensation for the attack, and he had turned this club in the center of the district into a makeshift hideout.

name: Dobashi Gonza
text: No, but...? Master said he had definitely cut down that incompetent fool...?

name: Yao Bikuni
text: Yes. I beheld with mine own eyes his heart, pierced by the blade. I cannot fathom that he yet liveth after such a thing...

name: Tsubaki
text: It doesn't matter what you say. I just gathered the information.

name: Tsubaki
text: There was a big commotion around Gosha about Diot-dono "coming back to life."

name: Tsubaki
text: Anyway, if you don't believe me, you can just go see for yourselves.
The mercenary Tsubaki replied with a bitter smile to the words of Gonza and Yao Bikuni, underbosses of the Nisha Clan.
Currently, Gaiza and his followers were concentrating their efforts on seizing control of their newly acquired district.
That was why the mercenary Tsubaki had accepted this request to obtain information from the outside as a spy.

name: Gaiza
text: ...No, there's no need for that. Information gathered by you is surely genuine. So he is alive... but how the hell...?
Gaiza gave a solemn nod and thought deeply.
He was sure that he had stabbed Fuma Kotaro through the heartーas sure as the feeling lingering in his hand.
It couldn't have been an illusion or a misunderstanding though...?

name: Gonza
text: Haha, then it's simple! If he's not dead yet, we just need to kill him however many times it takes!

name: Gonza
text: Master! Give me, Gonza, the order once again to eliminate himー!

name: Yao Bikuni
text: Ohoh? It is rare, but Gonza said something with which I can concur.

name: Gonza
text: Huh? What are you blathering about, Bikuni hag!? I'm a man who only says things that are correct!

name: Yao Bikuni
text: O-Hoho, how pleasant my life might be were it so. ーEven so, Master. I am of the same mind.

name: Yao Bikuni
text: He is the leader of the Fuma head family, even if he is inept and the title is of no substance. ーIf thou let him be, he would become a hindrance to thy supremacy, Master.

name: Gaiza
text: Yes. I know that, but... now is not the time.

name: Gonza
text: ...What do you mean?

name: Gaiza
text: It's certainly unsettling to hear that he's still alive... but we have other things to do right now.
Gaiza nodded calmly toward his underbosses, seated in a row.

name: Gaiza
text: We've got too many enemies right now. Dragon Gate, the UFS, and the Taimanin of Goshaー

name: Gaiza
text: This is our territory that we worked so hard seize. We have to solidify our position, so that they can't touch us.

name: Yao Bikuni
text: I see. Firstly we shall establish our footingーto put it another way.
Even though the territory had been acquired through a secret deal with Nomad, it was not perfectly under control yet.
There were frequent riots in the district, and there were signs that Dragon Gate and UFS agents were working in the dark.

name: Gaiza
text: Gonza, Yao Bikuni. I want you each to lead your troops andー

name: Gonza
text: And slaughter everyone with my spear...ーRight?
Gonza grinned and stroked the spear he was so proud of.

name: Gaiza
text: Hehe, no, no. Meet with the influential people of the gambling dens and brothels in the district and make them pledge their loyalty to us.

name: Gaiza
text: I don't care if they only pretend to for now. Every organization needs underlings. But don't show any mercy to those who disobey you.

name: Gonza
text: As you command!

name: Gaiza
text: Bikuni, I want you to set up a network to keep an eye on all influential people around here. Sort them into those we can use and those we can't.

name: Yao Bikuni
text: Yes, Masterー

name: Gaiza
text: Then go!! I expect results!!
As Yao Bikuni and Gonza respectfully nodded and walked out after receiving their orders, Gaiza turned toward Tsubaki.

name: Gaiza
text: AndーTsubaki, I need you to do me a favor as well.

name: Tsubaki
text: Oh? Is there another job you have for me?

name: Gaiza
text: There's still a lot of work to do. A mercenary I can put to use is essentialーYour next job is related to the UFS.

name: Tsubaki
text: The UFS?

name: Gaiza
text: Yes. It's not beneficial to continue fighting them at our current strength.

name: Gaiza
text: Try to make contact with an executive of the UFS in secret. I want to negotiate a reasonable compromise with them.

name: Tsubaki
text: Another rough job. Alright, I got it.
Tsubaki shrugged, nodded, and left the room.

name: Gaiza
text: And regarding the "Diot"ーregarding Fuma Kotaro.
Gaiza's eyes turned towards another underboss of the Nisha Clan who had remained in the room.

name: Gaiza
text: ーShonosuke, I think you're the right man for that job.

name: Gaku Shonosuke
text: Yes, Master.
The tall man, who had remained silent so far, nodded in affirmation.

name: Gaiza
text: If he's... if he's really alive, dispose of him. Can you do that?

name: Shonosuke
text: ...Leave it to me, Master. I, Gaku Shonosuke, will give it my all.
Shin-Minato District, in a red-light district.

Shin-Minato District was a newly developed area off the east coast of Ota Ward, and had been built on land reclaimed from the sea during the Second Urban Center Project that also included Tokyo Kingdom.
It had a huge cluster of skyscrapers, with businesses mainly focused on foreign capital, and a large downtown area where underground organizations were ruthlessly competing with each other.
And on the outskirts of this downtown area in Shin-Minato District, along a cluttered back alley lined with iffy shopsー
I was walking alone while muttering.

name: Me
text: That bossy old dude... even though I'm still recovering.
The "bossy old dude" I was referring to was the demonologist Kiryu Sabato, whom I had briefly interacted with on a previous mission.
After being fiercely reprimanded by Murasaki-sensei for running away without permission,
at present, Kiryu seemed to have returned to holing up in his basement laboratory in the academy to continue his shady research.
And the reason why I was complaining about Kiryu wasー

name: Kiryu Sabato
text: What!!? You want to ask me for help!?

name: Me
text: Yes... May I please ask for your help, Kiryu-sensei?
It was about the incident earlier where I had come back to life.
I didn't have the slightest idea what the reason had been and, grasping for straws, I had come to ask this man to examine me.

name: Sabato
text: Huhahahahaha! You stupid kid! Why do I have to listen to a god damn brat like you!??

name: Sabato
text: Get out, get out!! You little jerkoff... Is what I want to say, but yeah.

name: Sabato
text: Actually, I am being threatened by my beloved Murasaki, that if I don't help you, dipshit, she'll never speak to me again for the rest of my life.

name: Sabato
text: If it were temporary, then it would be like a reward to me, but if it's for the rest of my life, then that would be a bit tough, even for me.

name: Me
text: Uh-huh...

name: Sabato
text: ーSo I have no choice!! I'm gonna examine you!! But I also take pride in the fact that I don't work for free.

name: Sabato
text: Let me see... Guess I'll have you run one or two small errands for me!!!
...And these circumstances, which I couldn't fully comprehend, were how I had ended up running an errand for Kiryu-sensei.

name: Me
text: (Well, the errand itself isn't that big of a deal. If I'll be able to understand what happened, then it's a small price to pay...)
I had fought Gaiza and been stabbed through the heart.
Normally it would be absolutely impossible, coming back to life after having your heart totally destroyedー

name: Me
text: (Hebiko and Shikanosuke were happy though, talking about how "maybe he finally awakened to his Ninja Art!"...)
It wasn't as if there weren't similar techniques, such as Murasaki-sensei's Ninja Art "Immortal Awakening."
However, not knowing the reason left me uncomfortable.

name: Me
text: (Well, even though he has a personality like that, he certainly seems skilled, so I'll put my hopes on Kiryu-sensei's examinationー)

name: Me
text: Ah, this must be the store. Excusー
You can't come in here!!

name: Me
text: Huh...?
As I walked into the store I had come to visit, I suddenly heard that voice.
And in front of my wide-open eyesー
GRR-ROOOOOOOOOOOOOGH!!!

name: Me
text: Whoa!?

name: Me
text: (Wh-What's going on!? A monsterー!?)
I quickly rolled to the floor and avoided the incoming attack.
Howeverー
GRR-ROOOOOOOOOOOGH!!!
The monster changed direction in midair and doggedly chased after me.

name: Me
text: R-Really!?
And I dodged its attack once again. Even while rolling on the floor, I stared at the monster in order to understand the situationー

name: Me
text: I-Is that a... "Will-o'-wisp"!? Why is it in a place like this!?
It was a monster I had seen in a book of documents.
They were called "Will-o'-wisps," the souls of animals that had been turned undead by the miasma of the Devildom.
They were usually controlled by witches and the like, and were sometimes used as tools for curses and attacks.
Several of those Will-o'-wisps surrounded me and attacked.

name: Will-o'-wisp
text: GRR-ROOOOOOOOOOOOOOGH!!!

name: Me
text: Whoaaa!? S-S-Stop it all of you, even if you eat me, I'm not that tastyー
See!! That's why I told you not to come in!!
At that moment, a brilliant sword strike flashed through the airー

name: Will-o'-wisp
text: GRR-ROOGH!? GRR-ROOOOOOGH!!?
The owner of the voice from earlierーa masked girlーwas swinging a smallish blade.
One by one, the Will-o'-wisps were cut down and fell to the floor.

name: Me
text: This sword styleーthat's the Ace Katana Style!? Are you a Taimanin?
The Ace Katana Style was a Taima Sword Art that Akiyama Rinko-senpai also used, which had been passed down for ages.
That meant this masked girl was alsoー?

name: Masked Girl
text: You were able to tell from how I use my blade? Not bad.
The girl, who had eliminated the group of Will-o'-wisps, let out a chuckle.
But with no time to relax, countless Will-o'-wisps were spawning all over the store again.

name: Me
text: Woaah!? Againー!?

name: Masked Girl
text: Yes. They've kept at it since a while ago. There's no end.

name: Me
text: What... Don't tell me you stole something!?
I had heard that these days an increasing number of stores in shady cities were setting up magical traps to stop thieves coming from the Devildom.
Were these Will-o'-wisps also one of those traps?

name: Masked Girl
text: Of course I didn't!! I don't get it either!! As I entered the store, they suddenly began to attack me!!

name: Me
text: Is that so...?

name: Me
text: (If that's true, then where the hell are they coming from...?)

name: Will-o'-wisp
text: GRR-ROOOOOOOOOOOGH!!!

name: Me
text: Oohh!? Here they come again!!

name: Masked Girl
text: Pfffー
Once again, her brilliant sword strikes cut down the Will-'o-wisps.
Even to untrained eyes, the masked girl was a fighter of considerable skill.

name: Me
text: (She's not a student at Gosha Academy... is she? She's that strong, but I've never seen her before...)

name: Masked Girl
text: Hey, what are you just standing around for!? You're also a Taimanin, aren't you!? At least fight a little bit!!

name: Me
text: I'd really love to, but unfortunately I'm more of a support specialist.

name: Masked Girl
text: What's up with that?!!
The girl yelled in dismay and slashed through the Will-o'-wisps that had appeared again.
The fact that her strikes didn't slow down at all even while she was talking with me was truly amazing.
However, the Will-o'-wisps continued spawning one after another. If this kept up, there would be no end to it.

name: Me
text: Hey, listen to me. If this is some kind of magical trapー

name: Masked Girl
text: What!? If you can't fight, could you just shut up?

name: Me
text: No, just listen to me for a second!! For a Will-o'-wisp trap, there needs to be something or someone nearby controlling them.

name: Me
text: That's how sorcerers protect their house or treasures!

name: Masked Girl
text: !? How do you know something like that!?

name: Me
text: I've read about it in the archives of Gosha before!! There must be something controlling these demons somewhere nearbyー
As I looked around carefully, I noticed a ghost-like monster different from the Will-o'-wisps at the back of the storeー

name: Me
text: ーFound it!! Aim for that monster at the back!!!

name: Masked Girl
text: That thing? ...Got it!! I'll trust you for now!!
The masked girl quickly sliced through the Will-o'-wisps with her sword and leapt deeper into the store.
